title: TSG Noticeboard is live!
short: Dear Students, We are excited to announce that the new and improved Technology Students' Gymkhana (TSG) digital noticeboard is now live!
full:
We are excited to announce that the new and improved Technology Students' Gymkhana (TSG) digital noticeboard is now live! This platform has been redesigned from the ground up to serve as your central hub for all campus information, announcements, and events.

Discover a host of new features designed for your convenience:
- Real-Time Updates: Get instant access to the latest notices without any delay.
- Powerful Search: Quickly find specific information about clubs, events, or academic circulars.
- Personalized Notifications: Subscribe to categories you care about and receive alerts directly.
- Intuitive Categories: Effortlessly browse through dedicated sections for societies, hall activities, and official announcements.
- Mobile-Friendly Design: Access the noticeboard anytime, anywhere, from any device.
